title: Lund (Dr. G.)
body: An English physician who practiced medicine in Funchal and made meteorological observations here in 1855 and 1856. He wrote 'The climate of the Island of Madeira' in London, 1854. He also wrote another work in 1853 under the same title and also addressed Madeira in the Association Medical Journal, in September 1853.

Dr. G. Lund: English physician who practiced medicine in Funchal and made meteorological observations in 1855 and 1856
